programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Dark Waters" - A decomposing body is found in a pond and a tent is found nearby. Dr. G performs the autopsy in the morgue but finds few clues other than fingerprints and mouthwash in the stomach.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Ashes to Ashes" - On a Texas highway, a fire is discovered having burnt three bodies beyond recognition. Dr. G finds bullets in the bodies and determines that they were all shot before being set on fire.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a young woman disappeared, police feared she was the latest victim in a string of similar crimes. A pair of bloody gloves, unique tire tracks, and ordinary grass and pine needles provided investigators with some extraordinary clues.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Spanish Fly E7 "Expedition to the Seychelles" (2009)
The "Off-Season" S1:E5 "240 Pt. 1"
programme.desc: Buying land is something most people dream about. Whether you hunt, fish, or partake in other outdoor activities, there is just something about doing it on YOUR LAND. In most cases, buying a piece of property is the biggest investment in a person's life. Doing your research and putting boots on the ground is crucial in order to find out if the property is worth your money. With he correct management plan, even the most misused piece of land can be turned into a property of your dreams!

programme.title: The "Off-Season" S1:E6 "240 pt. 2"
programme.desc: With a run down and overgrown property that was once for sale, now ours... it's time to get to work. This land is sort of a "blank canvas" with so much potential for my son and I. with the thick bedding cover and an abundance of water sources already present, the sky is the limit once we add food and give the wildlife the security they need... It is now time to turn this 300 acres into a land manager's and die hard hunter's dream!

programme.title: The "Off-Season" S1:E7 "Tree Management"
programme.desc: When people think of creating food sources on their property for deer and other wildlife, the first thing that comes to mind are food plots. While these can produce a high volume of palatable forage, another great option is to plant trees. A variety of soft and hard mass orchards, if cared for properly, can provide another great source of nutrition year round, taking the quality of deer on your property to the next level!

programme.title: The "Off-Season" S1:E8 "Plantation Story"
programme.desc: Every year we try to incorporate new projects to drastically change the quality of habitat we have on the farm for our wildlife. A couple of years ago that project was to create a small hunting plot in the middle of a heavily wooded area in one of our prime hunting locations. This project has turned into what we now call “The Plantation Plot”. As a deer manager creating habitat for the wildlife is one of the most rewarding things you can do. In previous episodes, we went over things like what to do prior to planting, annual vs perennial plots, and even breaking down brand new property. But in this episode we will come full circle, and apply all of those concepts, to create a successful food plot from scratch.

programme.title: The "Off-Season" S1:E9 "Frost Seeding"
programme.desc: Frost Seeding. It's a practice commonly overlooked, but when done correctly can produce major results at a time when wildlife need it the most! And with very little equipment required, this method of establishing food plots is perfect for just about anyone!

programme.title: On The Water S17: E5 "Brown Sharks From the Beach"
programme.desc: On The Water teams up with shark scientist Dr. Jeff Kneebone to tag brown sharks from shore.

programme.title: On The Water S17: E6 "Autumn Rainbows on the Deerfield"
programme.desc: Chris Megan heads west to the Deerfield River for a fall fly fishing trip with guide Chris Jackson.

programme.title: Two Conchs Sportfishing TV S2:E5 "Ladies, Ladies, Ladies"
programme.desc: Who says fishing is for the boys? This group of ladies is going out with Two Conchs for a few days and showing everyone that fishing isn't just for the men.

programme.title: Circle Of Life
programme.desc: Showing both grace and strength, the Wild Sheep will leave you in awe a lot of times. Traversing across sheer cliffs and scaling the mountains of the great Rocky Mountain West. But what does the future hold for this majestic animal? As a public trust, they genuinely belong to all of us, so it's up to all of us to conserve them.

programme.title: Sweetwater S7:E5 "Sweetwater Siblings"
programme.desc: The full Sweetwater families take to the waters of Lake County Florida and the Coosa River to share the bond of fishing.

programme.title: Sweetwater S7:E6 "The Legendary Okeechobee"
programme.desc: Fresh off his top 10 finish on Lake Okeechobee, Miles shows Joey where to find some big Florida bass.

programme.title: Growing Deer S13:E42 "Are Wild Turkeys Eating Toxic Seed?"
programme.desc: Grant explains why neonicotinoids are a major concern for our environment and wildlife populations.

programme.title: Growing Deer S13:E43 "Treestand Setup and Maintenance Tips"
programme.desc: Tips to keep hunting safely and successfully every year.

programme.title: Growing Deer S13:E44 "Before and After: Timber Stand Improvement"
programme.desc: TSI is a great tool to improve wildlife habitat which leads to healthier deer and better hunting!

programme.title: Beyond The Grid S5:E5 "High country HUNT for a 200 inch GIANT! Public Land Deer Hunting"
programme.desc: Go high country deer hunting for a 200-inch giant?

programme.title: Beyond The Grid S5:E6 "Hunting Big Bulls in Grizzly Country"
programme.desc: Hunt elk deep in grizzly bear country with Ike Eastman.

programme.title: Backcountry Traditions S2:E1 "Alaska Part 1"
programme.desc: Angry Eagle Lodge and Outfitters is a paradise lodge nestled in the corner of lake Lliamna in Alaska. Accessible only by plane, this remote yet luxurious lodge has prime access to the greatest fly fishing waters the world has to offer. This is their story.

programme.title: Backcountry Traditions S2:E2 "Alaska Part2"
programme.desc: Alaska is the crown jewel of fisheries. Its undisturbed ecosystem enables the Bristol Bay region to produce and sustain the world's largest sockeye population. The future of this delicate ecosystem is currently threatened by an existential and non-reversible threat. Knowledge is power. Learn how you can join the fight to save and preserve Bristol Bay.

programme.title: Reel Life Adventures S1:E5 "From Flats Skiffs to Wakeboards"
programme.desc: Tucker and JC Carlson pole the crystal clear flats off Marathon in the Florida Keys using the Two Conchs Yellowfin 17 skiff. The brothers also visit Keys Cable Park to try their hand at wakeboarding.

programme.title: Reel Life Adventures S1:E6 "Marathon Permit and Key West Fish Dip"
programme.desc: Tucker and JC Carlson head offshore Marathon to fish for permit on the wrecks. The brothers also visit Key West to sample and rate smoked fish dip from local hot spots.

programme.title: Reel Life Adventures S1:E1 "Cobia Madness and Aquarium Encounters"
programme.desc: Tucker and JC Carlson fish in the Florida Bay for an epic cobia bite. They also visit Florida Keys Aquarium encounters to swim with the locals.

programme.title: Struttinbuck S10:E5 "Illinois Part 1"

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Johnny Beehner - The Flamingo Special
programme.desc: Johnny Beehner puts on a funny show. He's got everything you want from a comic: He's silly, he’s likeable, and he's fun. With a background in improvisational theater including training at Chicago’s prestigious Second City, as well as the Upright Citizens Brigade in Los Angeles, Johnny brings a unique style to the stage. Beehner made his network television debut in January of 2015 as one of the last comedians to appear on the Late Show with David Letterman. He has made numerous appearances on FOX "Laughs" television show, and regularly appears on the nationally syndicated Bob & Tom Show. His comedy can be heard regularly on XM/ Sirius Satellite radio. Other notable and accomplishments of Johnny's include winning First place in Comcast's 2014 season of "Trial By Laughter," placing third in the 2014 “Laughing Skull Comedy Festival” of Atlanta, and making it to the finals in the 2012 “Great American Comedy Festival”. He was named one of Ricky Gervais' Top 5 picks in the "Just Sayin” stand up contest. Johnny was recently named one of 2015's Top10, "Hot Comics to Watch" by his wife. She says that he would have a shot at the #1 spot if he would “work just a little bit harder”. He's a married man, a new dad, and his current life goal is to win just one argument with his beautiful wife.

programme.title: Matt Falk - Un-Lit
programme.desc: Matt Falk was called “effortlessly funny” by the CBC. He’s performed at Just For Laughs, The Hal!fax Comedy Festival and the Winnipeg Comedy Festival. He was recently named one of the “Best of the Fest” at the Burbank Comedy Festival in California.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Jason Russell - Beige Frosty
programme.desc: Like most comedians, finding a way to be silly in class was a way to get attention from classmates and teachers! Some teachers were amused others had no sense of humor.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Lisa Mills - This is My Real Accent
programme.desc: Lisa Mills is an Atlanta based, award-winning comedian, speaker, and author. Her acting debut was working alongside network television’s favorite military gal, Catherine Bell on the Lifetime Channels hit show, Army Wives.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Rob Brackenridge - Legend Dairy
programme.desc: Wisconsin native Rob Brackenridge offers sharp observations of his hometown with riffs on accents, beef snacks, and black ice.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Fred Klett - One of Ten
programme.desc: Fred Klett has built a career from being a clean comedian, a style that is his trademark. His comedy is G-rated and focused to appeal to families with members of all ages since much of his material is taken from his experiences growing up in a large Christian family. As a mainstream performer, his brand of humor is rare and refreshing and is rooted in his faith in Christ and belief in the Holy Scriptures.

programme.title: Jamie Lissow - Something Awesome
programme.desc: Actor and comedian Jamie Lissow is best known for his role in the current Netflix Original Series Real Rob, alongside SNL alum Rob Schneider, a show Jamie co-wrote and co-produced. Jamie made his network television debut on The Tonight Show and has since appeared on The Late Late Show, Last Comic Standing, Comedy Central’s Premium Blend, Gotham Live, Star Search, and his own half-hour Comedy Central special. A headliner at comedy clubs across the country, he’s also been featured at The Montreal Comedy Festival and The Great American Comedy Festival. Lissow has appeared on Fox News Redeye more than 50 times while still managing to have no political opinions.

programme.title: Mike Brody - Not Afraid of Butterflies
programme.desc: Starting comedy on a whim at an open mic in the year 2000, Mike Brody has since devoted his life to perfecting the delivery of his high-energy act. Bucking the trend of the apathetic comedian, his genuine passion for his craft draws audience members into the unique world of Mike Brody: an affable, clever guy whose life is often derailed by his own neurotic, obsessive-compulsive tendencies. Brody has worked with Jay Pharoah, Dave Attell, Patrice O'Neal, Emo Philips, Joy Behar, Doug Stanhope, Doug Benson, and legendary street performer/madman/savant Wesley Willis. He is the official event comedian for the SyFy Channel’s TV show Ghost Hunters and has also appeared on the nationally syndicated radio program The Bob & Tom Show as well as The Dan Patrick Show.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Steve Bruner - Simply Put
programme.desc: Steve Bruner looks like a perfectly normal guy—until he opens his mouth. He’s delivered his laser-sharp humor on Comedy Club Network (Showtime), An Evening at the Improv (A&E), Into the Night (ABC), and The Byron Allen Show (NBC), to name a few.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Christian Pieper - Glutton for Punishment
programme.desc: Christian Pieper is an award-winning and crowd-pleasing comedian from Beaver Dam, Kentucky, now living in Los Angeles. In just five years as a performer, Christian has quickly earned acclaim for his honest, smart, and welcoming approach to personal material, layering unexpectedly subversive observations on current events, culture, and relationships.A two-time semifinalist in the prestigious Boston Comedy Festival, hes also been featured in the Crossroads Comedy Festival, Burbank Comedy Festival, and other festivals and competitions across the country. Christian has also performed abroad, having done shows for troops and civilians in eight different countries, and was a guest on the Bob & Tom show. He currently hosts and produces Adrenaline, a comedy-challenge show presented regularly at Wiseguys Comedy Club in Salt Lake City and the Hollywood Improv.

programme.title: Bob Smiley - Tartar Terrorist
programme.desc: In-demand stand up comedian known for his machine gun approach and hilarious, clean material.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Rex Havens - Women & Children First
programme.desc: Rex has been delighting comedy audiences for 20 years, in world-famous comedy clubs like The Improv, Catch-A-Rising Star, Funny Bones and Zanies, on television for Showtime, Comedy Central and Comic Relief, on radio with Bob & Tom and NPR, cruise ships worldwide, and corporate clients including GM, American Express, Texaco, 3M, Coca-Cola, IBM, Toshiba, Lowe’s, Johnson & Johnson, Ameritech, Proctor & Gamble, State Farm, Quaker Oats, Verizon and the IRS (“Working for the IRS is the only sure way to get money from them.”), and numerous non-profit and charitable organizations, such as St. Jude’s and the Make-A-Wish Foundation. A former college professor who made the unusual transition to the standup comedy stage in the ’80’s, Rex has always believed that laughter is the best defense against a confusing and challenging world. Rex’s take on marriage and family has propelled him to performances in all 50 states and around the world, including London, Hong Kong, Amsterdam, Bermuda, Montreal, Barcelona, Copenhagen, Aruba, Rome and Cannes.

programme.title: Robert Mac - Know More
programme.desc: Robert's award-winning comedy is smart, subtle, and silly. Not too smart and not too subtle, but occasionally a bit more silly than youíd expect. And always clean. Robert is a regular at some of the finest comedy clubs around the country. Winner of "Comedy Centralís Laugh Riots." Finalist at "Billy Crystalís Mr. Saturday Night Contest", "San Francisco International Comedy Competition", "Boston Comedy Festival", "Jerry Lewis MDA Telethon Talent Search."
